A better way to scale.

Aircrft is a collaboration hub that enables founders/teams to collaborate on a crafting a framework to scale their startup culture, mission, and values.

Create your culture deck
Process

How it works

CREATES THE FRAMEWORK FOR A VIBRANT SCALABLE CULTURE

Aircft is a online collaboration hub that enables startup founders/teams to create, collaborate on, publish, and publicly share their culture deck.

1

Culture Deck

Craft, collaborate on, and publish your startup's culture deck. Share your purpose, your why, mission, and values.

2

Attract top talent

Post jobs openings that enables applicants to search and apply to your startup based on culture, mission, and values.

3

Escape velocity

Aircrft FlightDeck is your teams collabroation hub for navigating to your northstar mission, attracting top talent, and scaling a world-class vibrant company culture.

Developing a conscious culture is a business imperative. It enables the execution of the organizations strategy, the achievement of its goals, and the fulfillment of its mission.

Fred Kofman Author, Conscious Business
